programme.title: Miss Butcher
programme.desc: A man is brutally murdered. Gu-ho, the detective in charge, suspects Soon-ae, who runs a butcher's shop.

programme.title: The Senior Class
programme.desc: Jung-woo becomes his crush's friend by keeping her secrets but soon finds himself in a difficult situation.

programme.title: Part-time Spy
programme.desc: Government official goes undercover to a phishing group to retrieve budget, where she meets an undercover cop.

programme.title: Stalker
programme.desc: A woman suffers from a bizarre experience in a low-rent house and learns the terrible things about the house.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Kang-soo, an insurance investigator, has lost all the hope and purpose of living after his wife died. One day, the company gives him the case of Mi-so, a girl who’s fallen into a coma from a car accident. At the hospital he goes to investigate the case, he meets a girl who claims that she is Mi-so, who in reality can’t walk or talk. Kang-soo eventually comes to accept that for some reason only he can see the spirit of Mi-so. And Mi-so asks Kang-soo to help her biggest wish come true before she has to leave this world for good.

programme.title: Go Back
programme.desc: Ji-won, a motivated new police officer, is strangely bothered after meeting O-sun, a social worker. On a hot summer day, a kidnapper sends a message saying, ‘If you want to save the kidnapped child, donate money to the welfare center.’ The incident becomes a national concern as the media report it. Somehow, Ji-won doubts the link between the case and O-sun.

programme.title: Voice of Silence (HELLBOUND's Yoo Ah-In)
programme.desc: Two men, body wrappers for a gang, get a peculiar mission to take care of an 11-year-old kidnapped girl.

programme.title: OK! MADAM
programme.desc: Mi-Young runs a shop at a traditional market, where she makes and sells twisted bread sticks. Her husband Seok-Hwan works as a computer repairman. One day, Seok-Hwan wins a free trip to Hawaii. Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan will go on their first international trip together. When Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan get on the airplane to Hawaii, things don't go as expected. Terrorists, including Cheol-Seung, who chase after a secret agent, get on the same airplane. The passengers soon become hostages. Suddenly, Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan begin to rescue the passengers.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: Former couple goes tit for tat after a bitter break up, going into a deeper spiral of love and hate.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: An adopted pastor reunites with his shaman brother and together, they search for their mother with dementia.

programme.title: I Don’t Fire Myself
programme.desc: Jeong-eun is unfairly sent to a subcontractor but refuses to quit, aiming to return to the head office.

programme.title: Asurado
programme.desc: A string-wielding prisoner brings order to a violent prison—until his old enemy becomes the new warden.

programme.title: Lost Flower: Eo Woo-dong
programme.desc: Betrayed by her husband, Hye-in seeks revenge, becomes Eo Woo Dong, and sparks a scandal that rattles Joseon.
